price: Guyyaa humnaan gara ibidda jahannam oofamiinsa oofaman.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
